title: STREET HYPNOSIS compilation /non-verbal hypnosis/
description:
This is a compilation of Street hypnosis and the images are from the masterclass of Dr. Marco Paret. He is the founder of Universite Europeenne - the most advanced non-verbal hypnosis school in the world. If you want to get in contact with your deepest self, if you want to help your clients - participate in our course. There is a new training group from December 21, 2021. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Check out some other videos with our students on our channel:
https://youtu.be/xwy0mry12SM
https://youtu.be/sKXeWdz15cQ
